meanings.definition: (verb) to grill or cook (food) over an open flame or hot coals
meanings.sent1: I charbroiled some burgers for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant charbroiled the steak to perfection.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally charbroiled my marshmallows while trying to make s'mores.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of charbroiled meat filled the air at the barbecue.
meanings.sent5: The sound of sizzling charbroiled chicken made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: (adjective) cooked or grilled over an open flame or hot coals
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed the charbroiled vegetables at the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The charbroiled hot dogs were the star of the cookout.
meanings.sent4: The charbroiled aroma wafted through the backyard.
meanings.sent5: The charbroiled flavor lingered on my taste buds long after the meal.
